entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -4.5°C

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
